parameters.name: BackupEndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the backup task ended. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: BackupStartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the backup task started. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: **1**. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: MachineRemark
parameters.description: The information that you want to use to identify the servers protected by the anti-ransomware policy. You can enter the IP address or ID of a server.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description:
The backup task status. Valid values:

*   **BACKUP_COMPLETE**: The backup task is successful.
*   **BACKUP_FAILED**: The backup task failed.
*   **PARTIAL_COMPLETE**: The backup task is partially successful.
